Opened in the middle of September 2007, Ninh Kieu 2 Hotel is situated amid the area of high-class hotel at the center of Cantho city.(( Ninh Kieu 2 Hotel features 108 well-facilitated rooms of 4 categories (VIP Suite, Deluxe, Superior and Standard) that are all modern and luxurious.(( There are 2 VIP dining rooms, 2 large restaurants with the capacity of 200 to 400 guests and 2 meeting rooms to seat 100 and 180 people. Ninh Kieu 2 hotel is 4 star at the city centre of Can Tho with shopping centre... It offers a good place for overnight and walking surrounding Can Tho city and Ninh Kieu harbor. Offer 108 rooms with 4 different room catogeries: VIP Suite, Deluxe,Superior and Standard. All rooms are wooden designed and decorated with modern facilities. Especially VIP Suite room has private bath room. 
At Ninh Kieu 2 - Hoa Binh Hotel, every effort is made to make guests feel comfortable. To do so, the hotel provides the best in services and amenities. While lodging at this wonderful property, guests can enjoy restaurant, concierge, meeting facilities, safety deposit boxes, business center. Guests can choose from 108 rooms, all of which exude an atmosphere of total peace and harmony. The hotel offers an excellent variety of recreational facilities, including massage, steam room, jacuzzi. Whatever your reason for visiting Can Tho, the Ninh Kieu 2 - Hoa Binh Hotel is the perfect venue for an exhilarating and exciting break away. 
At TTC Hotel – Premium Can Tho you'll be within a short 5-minute stroll of Ong Pagoda and Ninh Kieu Park. Highlights at this hotel include a casino, a restaurant, and free buffet breakfast. 
TVs with cable channels are featured in all 107 rooms, and you can enjoy free WiFi, free bottled water, and safes. Minibars provide refreshments, and room service makes dining in an option. Nice touches to enhance your stay include bathrobes, slippers, and free toiletries. Hair dryers and phones are also available. 
The restaurant, The TTC Hotel - Premium C, serves international cuisine and is open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. WINDY SKY is the hotel's own bar. Enjoy the nightclub and fitness center. Additionally, you'll find free WiFi in public areas, a conference center, and a coffee shop/café. Free breakfast is available daily between 6:30 AM and 9:30 AM. There's also free self parking, along with the convenience of an airport shuttle. Featuring an in-house restaurant and free Wi-Fi access at all areas, Iris Hotel Can Tho is a modern building just 3 km from Cai Rang Floating Market. Rooms are stylish and fitted with carpeted flooring. Rooms are elegantly furnished with neutral tones. Each room comes with a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a seating area. The modern en suite bathrooms include hot-water shower facilities. 
Make yourself at home in one of the 73 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LED televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have rainfall showerheads and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and complimentary bottled water. 
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as a spa tub, a sauna, and a steam room. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services. Source: Free Articles from ArticlesFactory.com ABOUT THE AUTHOR
